{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6675nD |revision= |upc=649659019638 |ean= |asin=B007TS9ZSE |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/20/2011 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=True |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9566751028 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3883 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640EBTI-70G |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6JB-25 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3883 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT3092 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367R-VB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=Padavan ? |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} '''450Mbps Wireless Concurrent Dual-Band Gigabit iQ Router''' [http://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/global/wireless_routers_n450_dual_band/br-6675nd/ Product page] :[http://www.edimax.eu/images/Image/product/BR/BR-6675nD/datasheet/BR-6675nD-Datasheet.pdf Datasheet] *MEMORY :• Flash: 8MB NOR :• RAM: 64MB DDR2 *HARDWARE INTERFACE :• WAN port: 1x RJ-45 Gigabit :• LAN ports: 4x RJ-45 Gigabit :• Antenna: 3x 3dBi dual-band antenna *POWER ADAPTER :• DC 5V, 1.25A "1244-00000729-50Z" is silkscreened on the board. The [[Hawking HD45R]] (re-branded + re-shelled 6675nD) is using
RTL8367R-VB, so this device is currently assumed to.. However, the
original RTL8367R revision may be used with at least some of these units.
The FCC photos seem to show the device with an A-cut Realtek RTL8367R. According to the FCC manual, the default SSID is '''default'''. ===Additional external links=== *[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833315108 On Newegg] __NOTOC__
